fields.name: thymian_syrup
fields.description: Herbal syrup with extracts from thyme with added honey and vitamin C will help you with the non-stopping cough and swollen throat. The thyme will take care of bacteria and reduce irritation in your throat while honey, apart from adding some sweetness to it, will sooth the throat and stop the cough. Vitamin C was added in order to boost natural defences of the body an speed up healing process.
fields.healing_properties: reduces swelling in the throat, reduces inflamantion, good taste, starts working quickly, sooths the throat, stops coughing. We know syrups might not always be pleasant to drink and therefore we added blueberry juice to improve the taste.
fields.full_ingredients: thyme 75mg,fat 0g,sugars 1.2g, mangan 0.01g, vitamin C 5g, blueberry juice

fields.name: marigold_mellow_cream
fields.description: Marigold cream sooths irritated skin and helps with its regeneration. It also boost  its resistance to negative impact of external factors.
fields.healing_properties: Sooths the skin, heals the skin, regenerates the sking
fields.full_ingredients: Marigold extract, Soya oil ,Water (Aqua), Cetearyl Alcohol, Mineral Oil (Paraffinum Liquidum), Alcohol Denat., Caprylic/Capric Triglyceride, Glycine Soja (Soybean) Oil, Tocopheryl Acetate, Ceteareth-20, Calendula Officinalis Flower Extract, Fragrance (Parfum), Allantoin, Malva Sylvestris (Mallow) Flower Extract, Echinacea Purpurea Root Extract, Sodium Hyaluronate, Triethanolamine, Acrylates/C10-30 Alkyl Acrylate Crosspolymer, Sodium Cetearyl Sulfate, Sodium Lauryl Sulfate, Sorbitol, Phenoxyethanol, Methylparaben, Propylparaben, Potassium Sorbate, Ethylparaben, Tocopherol, Amyl Cinnamal, Cinnamyl Alcohol, Citral, Hydroxycitronellal, Benzyl Salicylate, Coumarin, Geraniol, Linalool, Benzyl Benzoate, Citronellol

fields.name: sleep_well_capsules
fields.description: This food supplements for better sleep will help you relax before bedtime thanks to chamomile mixed with levander extracts. It has relaxing effect on the muscles and at the same time it reduces stress and anxiety levels which leads to deeper relaxation.Vervain extract adds the product pleasant taste
fields.healing_properties: helps calm down, eases tension, improves sleep, quality, lowers stress levels, relaxes muscels
fields.vitamins_minerals: helps calm down, eases tension, improves sleep quality, lowers stress levels, relaxes muscles
fields.full_ingredients: marigold extract, hydroxypropylmethylcellulose, maitake mushroom extract (Grifola frondosa, fruiting body), reishi mushroom extract (Ganoderma lucidum, fruiting body), maltodextrin, acai palm fruit extract (Eutherpe oleracea, fruit), corn starch
